name: Display Live Visitors & Counter
author: Rajdip Sinha Roy

sections.description:
Show How Many Users Are Online On Your WordPress Site.
Usage and customization possibilities are endless!
Keep Track In Admin Dashboard.

Features

  • Show Users Gravatars
  • Sidebar Widget – Use Anywhere
  • Admin Dashboard – See Online Users in admin
  • Track Registered Users
  • Theme PHP function get_whos_online()

SHORTCODE

  • <?php echo do_shortcode('[who-is-online]'); ?>

Suggestions

The plugin does not change any core files or database.

If you’re facing any issues:-
Deactivate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English

If you can’t find this plugin in your language and want to translate it, use the dedicated tool at [Translating WordPress] (https://translate.wordpress.org/locale/it/default/wp-plugins/display-live-visitors-counter “Translating WordPress”).

Or, if you have created your own language pack, or have an update for an existing one, you can send it as an email attachment at rajdipsinharoy@yahoo.in.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. That’s All. This plugin works automatically so don’t need to configure anything.
sections.faq:
Does this work for WordPress < 5.0 ?

If you are using a version before 5.0, It’ll work but recommended to use latest WordPress and WooCommerce.
